name: Project Orbeus Demo
description:
Disclaimer - This game:

  1. has instances of flashing lights/patterns;
  2. is a work of fiction - any similarities to figures or events in real life is purely coincidental;

A short parallax mapping and game mechanics demo made by No One Studios' founder: Dennis Jar. The demo is meant to showcase the areas where artists, writers, and SFX designers can contribute, and takes about an hour+ to complete.

Even the smallest of steps matters, as long as you don't stop moving. 

Gameplay features:

  • The ABCs of combat Mk.III! Simple, yet powerful combat system centred around a three-stage combo base. Set up your abilities to weaken deadly enemies, or empower your allies as the situation dictates.
  • Parallax mapped environments! Experience more organic locales in the world of Orbeus like never before.
  • Punbelievable enemies III! Encounter original pun-based enemies!

What's in the download archive ("POCM.7z"):

  1. "PLAY" button;
  2. "DATA" folder;
